definition[0]: dead or appearing to be dead
example[0]: Anton’s lifeless body was found floating in the lake.
definition[1]: lacking the positive qualities that make something or someone interesting, exciting, or active
definition[2]: not living, or not having living things on it
example[2]: The surface of the Moon is arid and lifeless.
definition[3]: lifeless hair or skin is in bad condition and does not look healthy
